snippet: The move values Ant Financial Services at more than $45 billion and makes the Chinese government a stakeholder, according to people familiar with the transaction.
lead_paragraph: The move values Ant Financial Services at more than $45 billion and makes the Chinese government a stakeholder, according to people familiar with the transaction.

headline.main: Alibaba’s Financial Affiliate Is Said to Close Private Placement of Shares
